items.title: Add or Edit an Article
items.content: If you want to create an new article, in the Article view, click on the green 'New' button in the top toolbar to open the edit screen of your new article

items.title: Edit your Article
items.content: You want to change the content of an article? Just select your article and click on the 'Edit' button in the top toolbar to reach the edit screen

items.title: Publish your new content
items.content: You want to publish your content? Select the article(s) you want to pubish and click on the 'Publish' Button in the top toolbar so that your content can be displayed on the frontend of your site

items.title: Unpublish your content
items.content: One of your article is out of date but you want to keep it in your backend? Select the article(s) you want to unpublish then click on the 'Unpublish' button in the top toolbar. Your article(s) won't be displayed anymore on the frontend of your site but will still be available in your backend

items.title: Remove your content
items.content: Keep your backend clean! When you don't need anymore some articles, select your article(s) and then click on the 'trash' button in the top toolbar. It will put your content in the trash but without deleting it permanently
